verses.name: Joshua 13:14
verses.text: Only unto the tribe of Levi he gave none inheritance; the sacrifices of the Lord God of Israel made by fire are their inheritance, as he said unto them.

verses.name: Joshua 13:15
verses.text: And Moses gave unto the tribe of the children of Reuben inheritance according to their families.

verses.name: Joshua 13:16
verses.text: And their coast was from Aroer, that is on the bank of the river Arnon, and the city that is in the midst of the river, and all the plain by Medeba;

verses.name: Joshua 13:17
verses.text: Heshbon, and all her cities that are in the plain; Dibon, and Bamoth–baal, and Beth–baal–meon,

verses.name: Joshua 13:18
verses.text: And Jahazah, and Kedemoth, and Mephaath,
